title: War Robots: Frontiers - Cyclops Spotlight | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Sniper Elite: Resistance Vercors Vendetta Mission and Weapons Pack DLC OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4! Also available and free to all players: Fairburne's Armoury Weapons and Skins Pack!

Despite destroying the primary Nazi stockpile of the deadly nerve agent Kleine Blume, one final cache survived! This stash has now been loaded into artillery shells ready for an imminent launch against multiple targets throughout France. With millions of civilian lives at stake, Harry Hawker launches a daring attempt to neutralise the remaining Wunderwaffe before they can be deployed.

To help you complete your mission, the M1941 Rifle and Armaguerra OG-44 will be added to your arsenal. Used by the U.S Marine Corps, the M1941 is a powerful rifle with a 10-round high-capacity rotary magazine, requiring fewer reloads. Whereas the Italian Armaguerra OG-44 is a submachine gun that has a recoil mechanism housed above the barrel, resulting in extremely low vertical recoil.

The Vercors Vendett
title: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Vercors Vendetta Mission and Weapons Pack | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/overwatch/

Turn up the volume and take centerstage with the return of Overwatch 2 x LE SSERAFIM.

Overwatch 2 x LE SSERAFIM is back with vibrant colors, bold aesthetics, and more styles than ever before! Look your best on and off the battlefield with five brand-new Legendary skins - FEARLESS Mercy, Juno, D.Va, Ashe, and Illari.

And that’s just the beginning! Your favorites from before are back and brighter than ever with Blue Flame Kiriko, Sombra, Brigitte, D.Va, and Tracer. Get them in the new Blue Flame Bundle, individually, or in the new Ultra Bundle featuring all 10 stunning Legendary skins.

Turn up heat even more with free cosmetics you’ll earn through in-game challenges like everyone’s favorite fanboy, Fawksey James Junkrat!

Light up the night when Overwatch 2 x LE SSERAFIM returns for a limited time Mar 18-31.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #overwatch2 #lesserafim
title: Overwatch 2 x Le Sserafim - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
